marklogic.body:
a little more for your reading pleasure:
Rick Santorum grew Heated and accused a New York Times reporter over the weekend of distorting a statement he made in an earlier speech, yelling "It's bullsh*t" to him, ABC News reports.Santorum defended himself on Fox News this morning: "If you haven't cursed out a New York Times reporter during the course of a campaign, you're not a real Republican."
way to explain it, Rick!Â Now I'm convinced - it was the context in which you said you perfer Obama to Romney that made it ok......Â Again, not sure what other meaning of the word "WE" he is referring to that would allow anyone with a 3rd grade education to misinterpret what "WE would be better Off with what we have" would mean
